meanings.definition: Sajous (noun): A type of tree found in tropical regions.
meanings.sent1: The sajous tree provides shade and shelter for many animals in the rainforest.
meanings.sent2: I learned about the sajous tree in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The sajous tree waved its branches in the gentle breeze, as if greeting the morning sun.
meanings.sent4: The sajous tree stood tall and proud, its roots reaching deep into the earth.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green leaves of the sajous tree danced in the sunlight, creating a beautiful canopy.

meanings.definition: Sajous (adjective): Describing something related to or characteristic of the sajous tree.
meanings.sent1: The sajous leaves rustled softly in the wind, a soothing sound in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The researcher studied the sajous ecosystem to understand its unique characteristics.
meanings.sent3: The sajous-inspired artwork captured the essence of the tropical landscape.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was a vibrant green, reminiscent of the sajous leaves in the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The sajous fragrance filled the air, a mix of earthy scents and floral notes.
